reviews.review: this game pisses me tf off. its fun tho.

How NOT to recommend this game ??? I mean, this is the only multiplayer game I play. It's my all time favorite game. I simply love to be a survivor and escape a killer's chase and have the thrill of a horror song in my ears, while killer is trying to kill me. I simply love this and I'll recommend again, again, and again. Well done, behaviour, for this masterpiece.

Ill be honest that despite the fact that I suck that I do love the shit out of this game. From The pain stakingly close calls to the funny matches where a mind game ends up with you just staring at a survivor longingly. It's hard to get into some of the fun killers cause they may be complicated but in this case Im excited to try and learn Blight! I highly recommend taking the game into consideration cause it can even be fun doing SWF with a homie. Happy Thanksgiving!

this happened to my buddy eric

If you want to play killer don't buy the game, not to mention you have to buy every individual killer to get the perks for all of them and some of them you have to buy with real money. When you play the game you're mostly gonna go against survivors who have been playing the game for long enough to have the good perks that make you feel like you're at a disadvantage before the game even starts. Some of the maps are completely survivor or killer sided so you almost know the outcome as soon as you get into the game. If all the characters are free at some point it might be worth it to buy the game but as it is you will not get your moneys worth out of this game.
